product_name: The North Face Verto Jacket - Men's
long_description: Wind kicks up just before your crux lead? Pull out and put on the featherweight, windproof men's Verto Jacket from The North Face. Weighs only 3.5 ounces and can save your day. Windproof ripstop nylon has a durable water repellent finish to bead up light rain. Articulated elbows provide a natural fit and movement. Elastic-bound hem, cuffs and hood makes the Verto quick and easy to put on; no fiddling with cords. Zippered chest pocket doubles as a compressible stow pouch. Men's Verto Jacket from The North Face packs down to the size of an energy bar. The North Face Summit Series(TM) apparel is designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: Wind kicks up just before your crux lead? Pull out and put on the featherweight, windproof men's Verto Jacket from The North Face. Weighs only 3.5 ounces and can save your day.
